MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KY7 postcode area of Glenrothes affecting properties surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to repair a fault located on the overhead network we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:40pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:15pm on the 12th November 2020
